name: Slate
text: RT @mjs_DC: RBG had faith in humankind’s ability to better itself, to shed irrational bigotries, to come together in the pursuit of the greater good. She believed our current period of history will be remembered as an “anomaly.” It is now up to us to prove her right. https://t.co/oDsaNIUvFU

name: Slate
text: RT @lowenliu: In the days before her death, the justice dictated a statement to her granddaughter, Clara Spera: “My most fervent wish is that i I will not be replaced until a new president is installed.” https://t.co/CwG7PWuoPq via @slate

name: Slate
text: RT @LeonKrauze: Lean esto que ha escrito @mjs_DC sobre Ginsburg https://t.co/9MgWuRHPM5
